author: elkz
name: WebServer
short: A central cog to manage a web server for other cogs.
description: Provides a single, central aiohttp web server that other cogs can register their API routes with. This avoids port conflicts and simplifies management.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the WebServer cog. Please load it *before* any other cogs that depend on it (e.g., `[p]load webserver`). You can configure the host and port with `[p]webserver set host` and `[p]webserver set port`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any user data. It manages a web server for other cogs to use.
